long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make your LinkedIn account a B2B Lead Generation Powerhouse

How does Kanbox work?

1 / LinkedIn Scraper and Prospect Manager
Easily import prospects from LinkedIn and Sales Navigator. Obtain cleaned and duplicate-free data. Refilter and segment your prospect lists directly in Kanbox using advanced filters. Find your prospects' professional emails with one click, 100% GDPR compliant. Export ready-to-use CSV files.

2/ Automated Prospecting on LinkedIn
Create campaigns to automate LinkedIn profile visits, connection requests, messages, and follow-ups. Personalize your prospecting messages using templates. Conduct A/B tests, measure results, and optimize. Track all your campaigns in automated CRM Pipelines (Kanban).

3/ Smart LinkedIn Network Manager and Messaging
Organize your network with filters and labels. Batch process actions for sending messages, connection requests, and more. Full-screen LinkedIn messaging chat with key contact information to facilitate communication.

Is Kanbox right for you?
- Sales or Marketers: Empower your teams to develop LinkedIn prospecting.
- Recruiters: Streamline recruitment processes with simplified communication and candidate tracking with CRM Pipelines (Kanban).
- Influencers: Improve conversion rates with precise targeting and effective communication.
- Founders/CEOs: Segment, organize, and efficiently grow your network while increasing responsiveness to opportunities.

Why do our customers choose Kanbox?

1: All-in-One Solution
Kanbox is a comprehensive tool for collecting data from LinkedIn and Sales Navigator, managing prospects, executing automated campaigns, and managing your inbox, all on one platform.

2: Cost Efficiency
Control your costs. No more stacking tools and subscriptions! Kanbox is an exceptionally cost-effective solution for your business.

3: Top-notch User Experience
Enjoy an excellent user experience. The interface is simple and intuitive.

üë®‚Äçüíº Customer Service at Your Service
At Kanbox, we make your satisfaction our priority. Our customer service is always available, just a click away!

Note: We are not affiliated with LinkedIn Corporation. LinkedIn is a registered trademark of LinkedIn Corporation.
